posts.post_content:
Want to trade for the last three players I need for my 20th Century HOF player set. I need any playing era card of these three:

Hack Wilson
Stan Coveleskie 
Elmer Flick

Not buying right now - just trading. Please let me know what card(s) you have, a value, and what kinds of cards or autographs you are looking for in trade. Scans can be sent to [url]manderson@ha.com[/url].

Thanks for helping in this project!
Mark
